H0.text: Which was the last non-capital city to host the Summer Olympic Games. Los Angeles

H1.text: Which was the last non-capital city to host the Summer Olympic Games. Barcelona

H2.text: Which was the last non-capital city to host the Summer Olympic Games. Atlanta

H3.text: Which was the last non-capital city to host the Summer Olympic Games. Sydney

A4.text: Los Angeles for the 2028 Summer Olympics

A5.text: Sydney was one of the host cities during the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup.

A6.text: Sydney benefitted from the construction of significant sporting infrastructure in preparation for its hosting of the 2000 Summer Olympics.

A7.text: Barcelona is the capital and largest city of the autonomous community of Catalonia.

A8.text: Los Angeles will host the 2028 Summer Olympics and Paralympic Games

A9.text: Los Angeles has hosted the Summer Olympic Games in 1932 and 1984
